name: Technology
description: Companies involved in the development and manufacturing of technology products and services.

name: Healthcare
description: Organizations that provide medical services, manufacture medical equipment or drugs, and facilitate healthcare services.

name: Finance
description: Companies involved in the management of money, including banking, investment, and insurance services.

name: Consumer Goods
description: Businesses that manufacture and sell products that are purchased by individuals for personal consumption.

name: Energy
description: Companies involved in the production and distribution of energy, including renewable and non-renewable resources.
